description: Manage service identities of a VM scaleset.

commands.name: az vmss identity assign
commands.summary: Enable managed service identity on a VMSS.
examples: az vmss identity assign -g MyResourceGroup -n MyVmss --role Owner --scope /subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/MyResourceGroup
az vmss identity assign -g MyResourceGroup -n MyVmss --role Owner --identities [system] myAssignedId --scope /subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/MyResourceGroup
az vmss identity assign --identities readerId writerId --name MyVmss --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az vmss identity remove
commands.summary: Remove user assigned identities from a VM scaleset.
examples: az vmss identity remove -g MyResourceGroup -n MyVmss
az vmss identity remove -g MyResourceGroup -n MyVmss --identities readerId writerId
az vmss identity remove -g MyResourceGroup -n MyVmss --identities [system] readerId

commands.name: az vmss identity show
commands.summary: Display VM scaleset's managed identity info.
examples: az vmss identity show --name MyVirtualMachine --resource-group MyResourceGroup
